name: core-xhr
title: Core xhr
description:
core-xhr can be used to perform XMLHttpRequests.

    <core-xhr id="xhr"></core-xhr>
    ...
    this.$.xhr.request({url: url, params: params, callback: callback});

request.name: request

inOptions.method.name: inOptions.method

inOptions.sync.name: inOptions.sync

inOptions.body.description: The content for the request body for POST method.
